file_content.text: You've already picked your specialization, agent.
Keeper and Commander Dorne have authorized you for two combat specialization programs.
If you specialize in our Sniper program, your focus will be on the sniper rifle and the use of cover. Snipers are trained to shoot farther and do massive damage.
Join the Operative program, and you'll be trained to use stealth generators for surprise attacks and medical droids to support your allies, in addition to advanced close range combat techniques.
Once you choose a program, it will be permanently assigned to you. Now, make your choice.
I choose to become a Sniper.
You are not yet authorized for an advanced training program.
